# The enchant extension

Configure the `enchant` extension.

This extension provides binding for the Enchant spelling library.

## PHP_EXT_ENCHANT

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enable the extension.

## PHP_EXT_ENCHANT_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Build extension as shared.
